    public class PoleZeroResponse
extends Response
    base class for frequency domain PoleZeroResponse functions

      • response

        public final Cmplx[] response(int nfft,
                              double deltat)
        Returns the frequency response from the pole-zero-gain information. converted to Java from Earthworm function response in source file transfer.c
        Specified by:
        response in class Response
        Parameters:
        nfft - the number of points that will be used in the FFT
        deltat - the time interval between data points in the time-domain
        Returns:
        an array of Cmplx's containing the frequency response

                   throws ResponseException
        Returns the division of this response by another response.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • evaluateResponse

        public final Cmplx evaluateResponse(double frequency)
        Returns the response at a given frequency. following eq. 10.11 in Scherbaum, F. , Of Poles and Zeros Fundamentals of Digital Seismology Series: Modern Approaches in Geophysics, Vol. 15
        Specified by:
        evaluateResponse in class Response
        Parameters:
        frequency - frequency in Hz at which to evaluate response.
        Returns:
        the complex response.
